title: Illuvium Preview: Everything You Need to Know About the NFT Games and Airdrop
description: PREVIEW: Illuvium's NFT games are nearing an open beta release with an airdrop tied to the rollout. Here's what you need to know.

title: Bitcoin Halving Inches Closer With Fewer Than 2,900 Blocks Remaining
description: The next Bitcoin halving is on the horizon, drawing closer with each passing block and anticipated to take place anywhere between April 18 to April 22, 2024, at the milestone of block 840,000. Following this event, the reward for mining a block will halve from 6.25 bitcoins to 3.125 bitcoins. The following is a thorough […]

title: Crypto community comes for Jupiter over budget proposal
description: Well, here we are, staring down one of those moments in the crypto universe where the gloves come off and everyone has something to say. Jupiter, a name that’s been making rounds for a multitude of reasons, is under the spotlight yet again. This time, it’s not for launching a new feature or hitting a […]

title: Bridging the Digital Divide: AI-Powered Agents in the Information Bazaar
description: Buyers and sellers in online marketplaces have asymmetric information in this rapidly changing digital economy. Now, a new study, “Language models can reduce asymmetry in information markets,” by Nasim Rahaman, Martin Weiss, and co-authors suggests a rather new, AI-based solution: to use agents in a simulated environment called “The Information Bazaar.” The new study implies […]
